attribute.description: Indicates the mask to be used
attribute.name: mask

attribute.description: Indicates the component name a ser incorporado a mascara
attribute.name: attachTo

attribute.description: It indicates whether the fill should occur behind forward

tag.description: Renders event on mask after any key press
tag.name: mask-on-keypress
tag.example:
<html:input name="teste"/>
			<html:mask mask="(00) 0000-00000" attachTo="teste">
				<html:mask-on-keypress>
				    var masks = ['(00) 0000-00000', '(00) 00000-0000'];
					mask = (value.length > 14) ? masks[1] : masks[0];
					$('#'+$(field[0]).attr('id')).mask(mask,options);
				</html:mask-on-keypress>
			</html:mask>
